name: 72 Maze
description:
72 Maze is a narrative-driven, puzzle-platformer. Dash through various challenging labyrinths in this minimalist-style maze game, collecting and reconstructing your lost memories along the way.

Features


  • 72 Challenging Levels: Collect memories and dash your way to the exit!

  • Unique sonnet-styled story-telling: Reconstruct the poems from your lost memories, accompanied by beautifully hand-drawn, stylized illustrations.

  • Casual, minimalist gameplay: Easy to pick up and play!

  • Relaxing adaptive music: Enjoy the chill, lo-fi acoustic guitar.
